Segment.name: RET
Segment.comment: Provides information related to current or historical real estate transactions such as multiple listings, sales and loans

Field.name: InformationStatusCode
Field.comment: A code to indicate the status of information

Field.name: TransactionTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of transaction

Field.name: StatusCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the status of a business transaction, such as a claim, policy, real estate, or securities transaction

Field.name: StatusOfPlansForRealEstateAssetCode
Field.comment: Code identifying plans for real estate
